# 1. Load Packages
```{r}
library(brms)
library(marginaleffects)
library(tidyverse)
library(EValue)


options(scipen = 999)

set.seed(180822)

set_priors <- c(prior(normal(0, 1), class = b),
                prior(normal(0, 1), class = sd))
```

# 2. Load Data
```{r}
load("FAKE_cccu_MA.RData")

FAKE_cccu_MA <- FAKE_cccu_MA %>%
  arrange(CASEID)
```

#3. Load models of main analysis
```{r}
FAKE_m3 <- brm(file = "models/FAKE_m3.Rds")
FAKE_m4 <- brm(file = "models/FAKE_m4.Rds")
```

# 4. Senstivity analysis after FAKE_m4: controlling for unobserved selection effects
```{r}
#repeat models first
FAKE_m3_summary = summary(FAKE_m3, prob = .997)

FAKE_m4_summary = summary(FAKE_m4, prob = .997)
```
##compute OR and evalues

```{r}
#model 3 to compare e-value for unobserved / observed confounders
exp(FAKE_m3_summary$fixed)

#model 4
exp(FAKE_m4_summary$fixed)

#compute e-values

#model 3
#for contra_satis
evalue(OR(0.5229732 ,rare = FALSE),lo = 0.39381859,  hi = 0.7037303)


#model 4
#for contra_satis
evalue(OR(	0.4852764, rare = FALSE), lo = 0.33992131,  hi = 0.6790219)


```
